author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A classic novel depicting the decadence and excess of the Jazz Age.

author: Harper Lee
description: A Pulitzer Prize-winning novel exploring themes of racial injustice and moral growth.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel portraying a totalitarian society and the struggle for individuality.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien

author: Jane Austen
description: A classic romance novel exploring themes of social class and love in 19th-century England.

description: A coming-of-age novel following the experiences of a young man in New York City.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A high-fantasy epic detailing the quest to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical novel following a shepherd's journey to find his personal legend.

author: Suzanne Collins
